plot_supports_and_loads_2d

opsvis.plot_supports_and_loads_2d(nep=17, sfac=False)[source]

Display the supports and the loads applied to the 2d beam-column models (nodal and element loads).

Parameters

nep (int) – number of arrows when displacing element distributed loads (default: 17)
